templates.subject: Your intake is complete - {{practiceName}}
templates.body_html:
Hi {{firstName}},

Great news! Your intake with {{practiceName}} is complete.

Next Steps:

  • We've verified your insurance coverage
  • Your information is in our system
  • You're all set for your appointment

If your appointment isn't scheduled yet, our team will call you within 1 business day.

Questions? Call us at {{practicePhone}} or reply to this email.

— Allie

templates.subject: Action needed: Insurance verification - {{practiceName}}
templates.preheader: Please contact us about your coverage
templates.body_html:
Hi {{firstName}},

We completed your intake, but we encountered an issue verifying your insurance coverage.

What this means: Your policy may be inactive, or there may be a mismatch in the details we received. This is common and usually easy to resolve.

Next step: Please call us at {{practicePhone}} so we can confirm your coverage before your visit.

Don't worry — we'll still see you for your appointment. We just need to clarify a few details.

— Allie

compliance.hipaa: Emails contain minimal PHI (first name only). Document links are password-protected or require re-authentication.
compliance.security: All links use HTTPS. Magic links expire after 7 days or after use. Document URLs require secure token.
compliance.branding: All emails are white-label ready. Logo and colors are tenant-configurable.
